original_text: You have already had enough time in your life to do bad things. Those are the kinds of things that people who do not know God like to do. You did many evil things that your bodies wanted to do. You had sex in a wrong way. You often became drunk. You went to wild parties where you drank too much alcohol. You also worshipped useless idols.
korean_text: 너희가 음란과 정욕과 술취함과 방탕과 향락과 무법한 우상 숭배를 하여 이방인의 뜻을 따라 행한 것은 지나간 때로 족하도다

sentences.original_text: You have already had enough time in your life
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이미 인생에서 충분한 시간을 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: Those are the kinds of things
that people who do not know God like to do
that your bodies wanted to do
You had sex in a wrong way
where you drank too much alcohol
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 당신은 너무 많은 술을 마셨습니다
